data.text: @andonizw @Reuters Fool, play your trash words in other place
@HansenWendelboe @Reuters Sure, it is wrong not let people die.
@McKelviesWorld @Reuters 你是觉得自己身边人没有死，就防疫无所谓么？果然废青就是垃圾
@Reuters Mainstream news takes a much worse toll on society.  Cheerleaders for death.
@Reuters Psychological issues are also not really recognised in the Chinese/Asian culture
@Reuters Low vaccination rate, high deaths. Just get the people vaccinated and open up the economy. Period
@KaylaM00N @Reuters Sorry, you're right. It actually looks like the hotel on the left and not the concentration camp on the right. https://t.co/rvmyr3UJTf

@Reuters We all know that, but Hong Kong government and Beijing doesn’t care. In front of CCP political struggle to showcase zero covid supremacy over the west, humanity is nothing. Always the same, from #CulturalRevolution in Mao’s time to total crackdown in Hong Kong under Xi.
@andonizw @Reuters Concentration camp is when you fight a deadly virus from spreading 🤡
